message.content:
cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with clustering problems, which are typically studied in the computer science subfield of data structures (cs.DS) and machine learning (cs.LG). The additional constraint of avoiding over-representation of colors in clusters suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the subfields of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and natural language processing (cs.CL), which often involve clustering of text data. Finally, the use of linear programming in the algorithm suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the subfield of information theory (cs.IT).
